extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Graphical user interface of program. "author Antti Kurronen

      • getClosestMarkingPointAtScreen

        private java.awt.Point getClosestMarkingPointAtScreen(java.awt.Point p,
                                            int minDistance)
        Finds from selected MarkingPanel a marking closest to point where mouse was pressed. If (Manhattan) distance between them is shorter than given limit the point is returned.
        Parameters:
        p - Point at screen where mouse button was pressed
        minDistance - int minimum distance between single marking and where mouse was pressed
        Returns:
        Point if closed any close enough. Otherwise null;

        Returns:

      • isAllowedImageDimension

        public boolean isAllowedImageDimension(java.io.File file)
                                throws java.lang.Exception

      • manageImageLayersAndMarkings

        public void manageImageLayersAndMarkings()
        Starts the progress to add ImageLayers or import MarkingLayers to ImageLayers if any ImageLayer present: User gives the image and/or markings from file in new Dialog window. ImageLayer(s) are created or updated and when done, GUI layers, ImagePanel and ImageLayerInfo is updated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • openAddImageLayerDialog

        public void openAddImageLayerDialog(java.io.File[] fileList)
        Starts the progress to add one ImageLayer: User gives the image and possible markings from file in new Dialog window. ImageLayer(s) are created and when done, GUI layers, ImagePanel and ImageLayerInfo is updated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • refreshMarkingPanels

        private void refreshMarkingPanels()
        Refresh the all MarkingPanels by first removing all layer and then recreating them again. updates: imagePanel markingPanels, gridPanel and highlightPanel. Sets the selected MarkingPanel to front of layers.

      • setSelectedImageLayerAndImage

        public void setSelectedImageLayerAndImage(int iLayerID)
        Updates the InformationCenter and LayerVisualManager for which ImageLayer is selected and which BufferedImage object is in LayerVisualManger. Method updates the ImagePanel of GUI. This method is called always when selected (visible) ImageLayer is changed by user.
        Parameters:
        iLayerID - ID of ImageLayer that will be the selected ImageLayer (-> visible)

      • startCellCounting

        public void startCellCounting(java.awt.Point imagePanelPoint,
                     int size)
        Starts the precounting, opens a progress bar and calculates the cell positions.
        Parameters:
        imagePanelPoint - Middle Point of cell that user has picked
        size - Size of picked cell

      • startStopCellPicking

        public void startStopCellPicking()
        If cell picking thread is not running this method starts it. If the selected MarkingLayer contains markings, will a dialog confirm overwriting them. Sets glassPane visible and shows the cell selecting rectangle and round over the image. If cell picking was already running it will be stopped.

      • testing

        private void testing()
        For testing purposes opens one image at launch-> one ImageLayer and MarkingLayer created.

      • updateAllMarkingPanelProperties

        public void updateAllMarkingPanelProperties()
        Updates properties (color, size thickness, etc.) of all MarkingPanels.

      • updateCoordinatesOfSelectedMarkingPanel

        public void updateCoordinatesOfSelectedMarkingPanel()
        Updates the coordinates of markings of selected MarkingPanel. Gets the coordinatelist formatted to screen and sets to markingPanel.

      • updateCoordinatesOfVisibleMarkingPanels

        public void updateCoordinatesOfVisibleMarkingPanels()
        Updates the coordinates of markings in MarkingPanels by calculating the points at image to the points at screen.

      • updateGridPanel

        public void updateGridPanel()
        Refreshes GridPanel if selected MarkingLayer has Grid set as visible

        Parameters:

      • updateImageLayerInfos

        public void updateImageLayerInfos()
        Refreshes the Info Panel at right of main GUI where information of LAYERS are shown. Removes all panels of information and recreates them

      • updateImagePanelSize

        private void updateImagePanelSize()
        Informs the LayerVisualManger of the changed dimension of ImagePanel. The dimension is needed in transformation of image to fit in ImagePanel. This method is called always when ImagePanel size is changed (Splitpane size changed or GUI window size changed)

      • updateMarkingPanelProperties

        public void updateMarkingPanelProperties(int mLayerID)
        Updates properties (color, size thickness, etc.) of MarkingPanel, which id is given.
        Parameters:
        mLayerID - int ID of the MarkingLayer which information is used.

      • zoomAndUpdateImage

        public void zoomAndUpdateImage(java.awt.Point midPoint,
                      double zoomValue,
                      int processinID)
        Organizes the zooming of image in or out to given point and given zoom multiplier. Determines and refreshes also the markings, grid and highlight.
        Parameters:
        midPoint - Point where zooming will focus
        zoomValue - double multiplier how much is zoomed (1.25 -> 25% zoom)
        processinID - int ID quality of Image (ID.IMAGE_PROCESSING_BEST_QUALITY, etc.)
